goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
indicator_name: Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments and (b) local governments
graph_title: Доля мест, занимаемых женщинами в национальных парламентах
goal_name: 5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
target_name: 5.1. Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life
indicator_name1: 5.5.1. Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments
organization_name: National Statistical Committee of the Kyrgyz Republic (Labour and Employment Statistics Division)
definitions: The proportion of seats held by women in the Zhogorku Kenesh s currently measured as the number of seats held by women deputies to the total number of deputies in the Zhogorku Kenesh
concepts: Zhogorku Kenesh of the Kyrgyz Republic is a single chamber parliament of 120 deputies of the Kyrgyz Republic, country’s legislative body.
rationale_interpretation: In determining the list of candidates, a political party must consider representation of not more than 70% of  the same-sex candidates, also difference in the lists of candidates of women and men nominated by political parties should not exceeding three positions
data_sources: State statistical reporting form 1-GOS-brief (STATE)«Report on the number of employees in public administration bodies»
data_collection: State administrative bodies provide paper-based statistics to local statistical bodies, or statistics in electronic format to the NSC of the Kyrgyz Republic on 28 January upon completion of the reporting year
computation_methods: Number of female deputies, divided by total number of deputies and multiplied by 100 based on Zhogorku Kenesh provided data in the 1-GOS form
data_availability_gaps: Data are published in the statistical compendium «Kyrgyzstan in figures», «Women and men of the Kyrgyz Republic».
